person.persName: William L. Stevenson (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Margaret Stevenson. Married to Martha J. Sherill Stevenson on August 13, 1851. Father of Milas Stevenson, Lowery J. Stevenson, Edgar A. Stevenson, Nannie G. Stevenson, and Mattie Stevenson. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.
